pr_title: Add support for delivering of results of Jet queries to the client

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't System.currentTimeMillis enough here? (though, I do not know any performance difference between nano and millis
The last line in this method calls hasNext which is blocking as well. Therefore, the idea of early return doesn't really work in this prototype. Instead, the method should return as soon as the very first call to hasNext returned something
timeline.author: devozerov

replies.bodyText: nanoTime() should always be used for elapsed time. CTM isn't monotonic in rare cases, doesn't run at constant speed. Performance differs by OS and JVM implementation, but I think on Linux they are comparable. IIRC on Windows CTM is faster, but also much less precise (~15ms resolution)
replies.author: viliam-durina

timeline.bodyText: Let's avoid Runnable and introduce a separate interface with proper name.
timeline.author: devozerov
